channel.title: How can i add more things like character-kills = 0
channel.description:
hello, i am making a thing so that you can press next page and i want it so it saves to your file that you are on page 1, 2 or 3 heres some i already have:
character-cat = 0 character-tz = -1 character-starter = 1 character-newstart = 0 character-pouch1 = 0 character-pouch2 = 0 character-pouch3 = 0 character-pouch4 = 0 character-energy = 99 character-taskID = -1 character-taskAmount = -1 character-jad = 0 character-q1 = 0 character-q2 = 0 character-q3 = 0 character-q4 = 0 character-q5 = 0 character-q6 = 0 character-q7 = 0 character-q8 = 0 character-q9 = 0 character-q10 = 0 character-q11 = 0 character-q12 = 0 character-q13 = 1 character-brightness = 0 character-fighttype = 1 character-skill = 0 character-chat = 0 character-sled = 0 character-deathspawns = 0 character-ancients = 0 character-pin = 0 character-qp = 0 character-saradomin = 0 character-trolls = 0 character-event = 0 character-graar = 0 character-graarpoints = 0 character-uptime = 0 character-dshield = 2 character-kalph = 0 character-dagg = 0 character-dad = 0 character-kbd = 0 character-pvp = 0 character-mithd = 0 character-mole = 0 character-verac = 0 character-torag = 0 character-karil = 0 character-guthan = 0 character-dharok = 0 character-ahrim = 0 character-retaliate = 0 character-action = 0 character-pcpoints = 0 character-assault = 0 character-donator = 0 character-donatorpoints = 0 character-funpks = 0 character-funpkdeaths = 0 character-pkkills = 0 character-pkdeaths =0 character-radeaths =0 character-blackmarks = 0 character-bow = 100 character-shield = 100 character-startr = 16 character-mb = 0 character-ce = 0 character-sp = 0 character-aa = 0
I would like to add 1 called character-page = 0 Thanks ;)

Save it to your character logs.

item.title: How can i add more things like character-kills = 0
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

I get the whole ‘next page’ deal, and you never even asked about character-kills?

Bmaw:

Declare a method for character-kills

Declare an integer, not a method.

Read full topic
